lender.name: c-stuff.com
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of chanelling some of what we earn to development, and to helping other entrepreneurs. We will loan 3% of our revenue from each internet sale.
lender.occupational_info: Selling computer and office supplies.

lender.name: Billie
lender.loan_because: I care. I want to be a good example, and practice what I preach!
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of art history, and I teach about the art and cultures of Africa, Oceania, and the Native cultures of the Americas. I want my students to learn respect for other people and their cultures, and to care about others.

lender.name: Lanre
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do ,and most especially to help our fellow human beings in many third world countries who are not as fortunate as those of us living in the USA and other industrialized countries.
lender.occupational_info: My work in the Military is exteremely hectic, but I love my job and and the discipline and most especially my current job enables to travels to different part of the world.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I have a hart.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to fulfill a dream and create stability for those they love.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large telecommunications company, and am responsible for the company's charitable donations in the community. I plan community events, and serve as my company's spokesperson in the media.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate and want to share my fortune with others. I think Kiva is a unique opportunity to reach out to people in a more personal way.

lender.name: Alyson
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone take the next step in their life
lender.occupational_info: I design buildings

lender.name: Lynx
lender.loan_because: Everyone should.

lender.name: rocio
lender.loan_because: God is good!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: if we can't help one another then why are we here?!

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: My wife and I like to try to help those in less developed and fortunate countries than ours. We genuinely consider ourselves to be lucky to have been born into a relatively comfortable 1st world environment and firmly believe in the 'pay it forward' philosophy. Just glad we can do something, no matter how small and insignificant to help.
lender.occupational_info: Optimistic about the future

lender.name: Debra and Chris
lender.loan_because: We have been supported by many people and institutions throughout our working life, and we want to give back to people in other parts of the world who are striving to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: Debra teaches Spanish and Chris teaches Religious Studies at the College level.

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: I just love helping people. I have had so many wonderful people in my life and I would like to make someone as happy as I am.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my youngest daughter who is 12. I volunteer in art education. II work on projects in my community to bring art to the public.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.occupation: booking agent and business school student

lender.name: Ann and Henry
lender.loan_because: We feel it is important for everyone to do what they can to help others.

lender.name: Margaret Z.
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I had 4 children and worked hard in the home to see they had good nutrition, good habits, clothing that was clean and that they were respectful and kind to the people around them.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with much and want to bless others in the same way.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It feels good. It feels right.
lender.occupational_info: Using a computer, I put all the elements together (music, dialog and picture) to make a television show.

lender.name: joe
lender.loan_because: helps somebody out...doesn't hurt me...makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I fly in a KC-135 and refuel military aircraft in all conditions in-flight

lender.name: LORI
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to have a wonderful family and a wonderful life. I would like to help someone improve their life if possible.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer in my community especially with youth organizations and animals.

lender.name: Ioannis
lender.loan_because: It is nice to help and give to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I contact research and develop mathematical software that help people make better decisions.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.occupational_info: I write stories and books about women.

lender.name: Kavita
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Support services manager for a bankruptcy software company

lender.name: Kathryn & John
lender.loan_because: Other people have loaned to us when we wanted to do more for ourselves. We want to pass on those blessings.
lender.occupational_info: We raise horses and John installs plumbing into homes. Kathy works in an office taking care of other people's money.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: these causes matter. Kiva provides long-term solutions not a 'hand out.'
lender.occupational_info: I help children learn and prepare for their future.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Loaning to those in need (particularly working people in poverty) around the globe makes a positive impact on us all. It also sets a good example for my daughter who I would like to see grow up with experiences that don't all revolve around myspace.com, cell phones or fashion. Lastly, there is nothing more satisfying in life than helping others to fulfill a goal or realize a dream!
lender.occupational_info: My most important job is raising my one-year old daughter with my husband. I started my own real estate firm when I was pregnant that allows me the flexibility both to raise her and to maintain a career path while helping to support my family. Besides, I love assisting people who are buying or selling a home!

lender.name: Rosario Chico
lender.loan_because: In life do what matters and what is most important to you...important enough to make you happy and not question why you are doing it. I am a dreamer. I love enthusiastic people who are self-motivated and strive to create a change in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a film and broadcast major at Stephens College In Columbia, MO (United States). Stephens is an all women college. I want to create films that will contribute to this world in a positive manner. I want to help educate the world that there is purpose past our own life. Somewhere out there is a person in need, a person with desires, a person that can not do it all on their own, and it is up to those most fortunate to create a change in the lives of these people.

lender.name: Cassaundra
lender.loan_because: By loaning, I am helping someone potentially improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment, my only job is to learn. I am a college freshmen, meaning this is my first year at college.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because:
because I can.
Everyone deserves the opportunity and freedom to pursue the life they desire.
Helping one another out is essential and every individuals responsibility.

lender.name: Kimiko
lender.loan_because: This is really great and fantastic idea to helping people to be financialy independent and improve their life standard!
lender.occupational_info: I'm Japanese who is working at the private high school in Singapore as school nurse. My husband working at the clinic as MD and we have two daughters.I have been living in south east Asia for nearly 19yrs. I wanted to do something to help people but I didn't know how , but I found this now. I'm really looking forward to hearing from my lenders how they are trying to expand thier business.

lender.name: Carola
lender.loan_because: I think loaning is to give trust, which is defenitely worth more than paying off your bad conscience.
lender.occupational_info: I write for companies and newspapers in the Netherlands

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of helping other people
lender.occupational_info: I help take care of my Parents

lender.name: Scott & Carmel
lender.loan_because: You never miss a small amount but itmakes a big difference to others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: We grow Wheat, Barley and Canola with Prime lambs on 3500 acre family farm near Willaura in West Victoria, rainfall 500mm year. We have three children, Archie, Maevie and Alfie.

lender.name: Coach Bay
lender.loan_because: I believe that each life matters, and we all have a role to play. I work on changing lives in the Global Village - one life at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I coach people to help them become the best they can be. Explore their potential and assist them to make a difference.

lender.name: 2 Sweet Boys
lender.loan_because:
March 8, 2010-It is amazing to see that our original investment of $75 could help so many people. We donated our birthday money to Kiva. We are just going to keep re-lending it for as long as Kiva exists to re-lend it on. 10 people and counting....
Sept 19, 2007-We want to help others. It is so easy to reach out and help someone. We are giving Kiva gift certificates for Christmas, so that our friends can help too.

lender.name: Richard & Jacqui
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for my salvation through the Lord Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I watch for bad guys and try to catch them before they do bad things.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I built my businesses up from scratch an know how tough it can be even when resources are available.. I LOVE to help other people realize or maintain the dream of independence and self sufficiency. Especially those in areas where funds are less accessible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business owner of retail and construction businesses. I am also a regular volunteer for agencies in my area that work with refugees.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: In honor of my mother, Mary, who passed away 9/20/06 and as a way to put my money to good use somewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing for a large credit union in Northeast Florida

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: If I can make a loan, it doesn't make sense not to. Why shouldn't we help each other? Plenty of people have helped me. It fills my soul, so thank you for the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I have a Master of Fine Arts. I paint, teach all ages, and create shows of artwork.

lender.name: Francine
lender.loan_because: I love helping people in any capacity I can. If many donate, loan, or give a little, it generates abundance.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, for now. I used to work at a world renown cancer hospital as a medical transcriptionist.

lender.name: Arel Moodie
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone who is doing good deserves a chance to make it. We can all lift as we climb.
lender.occupational_info: I travel to colleges and organizations teaching students how to better their leadership skills and success rate while using the entrepreneurship mindset

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed time to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I cook and bake ,buy and sell things

lender.name: Maraika
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is the future
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer!

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I serve in the United States Air Force. I am a computer operator.

lender.name: shiho
lender.loan_because: I would like to do something helpful for neighbors who have a difficulty.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I live in a part of the world where I have everythings I need and more, why not give to the people in the world who don't have everything that they need.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: it's a very effective way to make a positive difference in the world. You can see results, it's easy to do, and what seems like a little money to us can make a big difference to someone else. It's also great to be able to leverage the power of many people coming together to help out, and Kiva does that brilliantly.
lender.occupational_info: For fun I write and perform music, but to earn a living I do research into how people search for information on the internet.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate that I would like to be able to help someone else.

lender.name: PETER
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get loans to develop a business.
lender.occupational_info: I renovate houses for rental or re-sale

lender.name: Cedric
lender.loan_because: I saw it on Oprah and it seems to be a great program,.
lender.occupational_info:
Title: Assistant Director of Strategic Marketing and Partnerships
Construct and present marketing proposals and solicit promotional partnerships Come up with creative marketing ideas Manage revenue generating partnerships

lender.name: Beth & Tim
lender.loan_because: I feel it is better to give a "hand up" rather than a "hand out."
lender.occupational_info: Beth is a student studying to be a wildlife biologist. Tim builds and operates large astronomical telescopes.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell used and rare books.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone fulfill their dreams and needs in building and growing their business. Indirectly, I am able to impact other people who buy from them.
lender.occupational_info: As an IT project manager, I plan and manage endeavors that result in some product or service, usually software that will allow people to get their information in an easier and more timely manner.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am fortunate enough to have had people help me get to where I am in life and I am now able to continue the cycle and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an owner of a small company that writes software which helps newspapers and magazines create their printed materials more efficiently.

lender.name: Leilani
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed through the years with people helping me and I just want to pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I create and design advertising pieces for commercial use.

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: I know the meaning of hardship and poverty - and I will never forget that. My life is much better now than when I was growing up - and I wish that what little I can offer can make a difference to someone. I pray that someday I can do more.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need to become successful businessmen and women
lender.occupational_info: For 30 years I taught music to children between the ages of 10 to 18. Many have become music teachers like me.

lender.name: Jenni
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a powerful tool for positive social transformation.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand from time to time.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to better themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary and middle school students how to use the computer.

lender.name: Winter
lender.loan_because: I would hope someone would do the same for me. No greater gift is needed more then love!

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I'm looking for ways to show my appreciation for being born in a developed country with plenty of opportunities.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I sell medical products to physicians.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to prosper in life.

lender.name: Adriane, Edney, Pup Eli
lender.loan_because: We lost everything in a fire and it is so hard to rebuild. Just another way to feel the gratefullness of what we have. People are constantly helping us and I always believe in "pay it forward"
lender.occupational_info: Helping people find clothes to travel around to different countries for leisure and volunteering including insect protection and sun protection clothing

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I have a little extra to spare and don't need to buy an extra pair of shoes!! Plus I know it will go much further and make a bigger difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the vulnerable. The people who have the least and need the most help.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I love supporting local businesses and contributing to economies that support the residents in a community. Even at home in the States, I prefer shopping at independently owned stores and eating in family-owned restaurants. It's a great way to live!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently unemployed. I had been working in advertising, but the economy forced my company to lay me off. I am looking for a new job. Wish me luck!

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Even though I am far from wealthy, I am truely blessed in too many ways to number. God desires that we be good stewards of His blessings and as such it is my desire to share these blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but have chosen to work at Boys & Girls Town. This is an organization that provides homes and treatment to troubled youths.

lender.name: Lisa & Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I have such blessings in my life, my daughter from India, my friends and my career. I really wanted to help a woman in the world find her own hope and joy. I wanted to share this with my best friend so that she can have all the happiness giving gives to us.
lender.occupational_info: Work on large technology projects in a corporate setting.

lender.name: M family
lender.loan_because: We like the feeling of being able to empower someone else to achieve their dream.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I believe that financial growth leads to personal and political freedoms more surely than any other readily available means. I believe that entrepreneurship is vital to improving and sustaining local, then national, economies.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney.

lender.name: Schevus
lender.loan_because: I am always trying to help make the world a better place. I try to help out whoever I can, whether it be friends, the homeless, or even the less fortunate overseas.
lender.occupational_info: I develop web based applications using the Java programming language.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.occupation: Small business owner & grandmother and mother

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I too am a small business owner and want to help others create a sustainable living.

lender.name: Karishma
lender.loan_because: Because I love the idea of knowing where my money is going, and how its' helping assist someone...

lender.name: Cortney
lender.loan_because: I care. Plus entrepreneurship rocks!
lender.occupational_info: I make sure the numbers are correct.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: My travels in the developing world have shown me first-hand how microloans can truly empower individuals to improve their lives and communities. I love that Kiva is bringing that awareness to a wider audience and providing opportunities for people to get involved.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Certified Life and Career Coach with a passion for Career Breaks, Life Sabbaticals and Long-term Travel. I love working with clients who dream of traveling, living, working, studying or volunteering abroad and my specialty is empowering people to escape their cubicles so they can strike out and discover the world on their own terms!

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: "Hope is a waking dream." by Aristotle

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling of helping others- even if it's by writing a check. I am inspired by their stories.
lender.occupational_info: I travel across the East Coast of the United States by plane and by car. I sell services to Insurance Companies.

lender.name: Luiz Felipe NF.
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that by helping other to help themselves we are making our contribution for a Better World. Plus, I do think that daily actions counts and it doesnt matter how small it is! So, if you are a believer just like us, join Kiva and sponsor someones dream.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: the opportunity for prosperity should be available to all of humanity.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: i am blessed to live in a place of abundance, and I want to help others less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I research market trends and regulatory developments around the world in the energy market. My company produces meters that measure eletrical power, and software that permits multiple meters to feed their information to a central server. Our technology enables large consumers of electricity to better manage their power usage, reduce waste, reduce costs, and increase efficiency and operational uptime. This saves money and reduces greenhouse gas emissions.

lender.name: Jenia
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Nancy & Ron
lender.loan_because: We can't all do great things, but we can do small things with great love. Quote by Mother Teresa

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I have visited some beautiful countries with such friendly and enterprising people that just need a chance to make a go of it.
lender.occupational_info: We bake fresh rum cakes, package them, and sell them to consumers and stores.

lender.name: Reynolds High School
lender.loan_because: We know it's important to reach beyond the walls of the classroom into the community!

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I want to spread the wealth!!
lender.occupational_info: I brew craft beer for the community around me!

lender.name: Sherri
lender.occupation: writer, editor, appraiser, lawyer, shop owner

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: ... we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work in television as an entertainment producer for a morning show in NYC but I left to follow my lifelong dream - to be a foster parent to children in need. My partner and I had 2 placements before adopting our awesome little man Ethan!

lender.name: colleen
lender.loan_because: i received a gift certificate for Kiva, for my birthday, from my neighbors! they know me well... they knew that this was the perfect gift for me, to be able to gift to another!
lender.occupational_info: i work in a school for emotionally and mentally disturbed children, ages three through eleven. i specifically work with the children when they are having difficulty behaving. i help them have the best school experience they can, despite their limitations.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Sarnia Collegiate
lender.loan_because: we want to help developing countries establish a better economy. It only costs a few dollars each to help someone 4000 miles away.

lender.name: Deborah & Gary
lender.loan_because: Because we are all in this world together!

lender.name: Reynolds High School
lender.loan_because: We know it's important to help others! Our one dollar each can make a difference!!
lender.occupational_info: We're one of five classes that's decided to do what we can to help others in need!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Kakbank
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who get together each month to lend money and eat cookies!

lender.name: Reynolds High School
lender.loan_because: We use Spanish in class every day and want to support others outside the classroom
lender.occupational_info: We're in 9th-12th grades and know the importance of an education to succeed. We want to help this family succeed as well!

lender.name: Reynolds High School
lender.loan_because: We're learning Spanish. We want to help those who are Spanish speaking be successful in their efforts
lender.occupational_info: 9th-12th grade Spanish II students

lender.name: Reynolds High School
lender.loan_because: We learn Spanish and about different cultures and want to support those cultures
lender.occupational_info: 9th-12th grade students who want to be successful and help others be successful.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: Kiva has developed a more efficient and effective way to donate to those in need in developing nations. I believe that it's often better to improve the world with a bottom-up rather than a top-down approach. I also greatly appreciate the fact that I'm not just donating money to people to meet their immediate daily needs of food, clothing, shelter, medicine, etc. that they require just to get by; instead, I'm helping them develop a means of personal and economic development that will sustain their well-being for the long-term.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an ice hockey referee, a math and english tutor, and an aspiring high school history teacher.

lender.name: Pedro J
lender.loan_because:
Kiva me ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos a quienes resulta realmente difcil acceder a los canales normales de financiacin y que, gracias a los microcrditos, pueden desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida. Toda persona merece una oportunidad y esta es una de las formas ms eficaces y dignas de ayudarle.
Thanks to Kiva it is possible to support people in need giving them a chance to create a sustainable business. I really believe microcredit loan is a strong tool to help people around the world to improve their lives.

lender.name: Beau
lender.loan_because: I am a strong believer in Pay It Forward. I have been given MUCH in life and it feels good to be able to give back to someone else. I had a friend who helped me start a business. Now I can do the same for someone else! I am excited about this project.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of meteorology. I learn about weather! I work with local emergency management to make my community safer during severe weather outbreaks. I also volunteer some of my time for the American Red Cross. I run my own business which invests in real estate.

lender.name: Marisol & Alberto
lender.loan_because: I care! My family came from a poor upbringing in Mexico and I have been lucky enough to have become successfull. I know first hand how hard it is to start a business and borrow money, my father succesfully started his business in his home country of Mexico (I remember putting stone to mortar on one of the buildings as a little kid!). My main focus is Mexico since that is where my family is from. My husband Alberto is an economist and we have had discussions on helping folks with a hand-up (via a micro-loan) rather than a hand out. So to all of you that are in a positon to help I say, share your success with others!
lender.occupational_info: Providing assistance in an office and distributing information.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am selfish, and giving has always filled my heart more than receiving. I like having a full heart, so I give. Besides, we're all family and brothers and sisters are supposed to help each other.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I suppose I'm in a position where I can. The community concept of KIVA just makes perfect sense to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising, marketing and new media in the developing nation of Fiji.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It helps people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate and want to share my blessings.

lender.name: Gus
lender.loan_because: I don't need an SUV, a boat, a five bedroom house, a giant flat panel tv, a summer cottage, a rolex watch or a designer pet. I have my dog, a roof and a good job. It's a nice feeling to be able to give a little back to help someone with a dream.

lender.name: Dvrenaissance Foundation
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can! We loan because of the help that Dvrenaissance Enterprises received when we were just starting. If we can help someones dreams come true with just a little bit of help, then we are more than happy to do our part. It's time to make a difference... It's time for dreams to come true!
lender.occupational_info: The Dvrenaissance Foundation offers assistance (time, money, etc) to entrepreneurs who are trying to make a difference in the World.

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to realize her dreams
lender.occupational_info: I develop web based computer systems. It's a great job!

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: My advantages are an accident of birth- I am grateful for them and want to give a bit of that advantage to someone else in need of it. The idea that I am separate from my fellow humans is an illusion that I wish to dispell.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand the law and try to make good choices for their workers.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I may not have a lot of money, but I have more than many, many people in this world. If I can afford to help, I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing and American literature at a public university in North Texas.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: This is a unique opportunity to have a direct impact to help a family rise out of poverty.

lender.name: hassan & andrea
lender.loan_because: we can =)

lender.name: Gregg and Helen
lender.loan_because: We loan because 100% of our money goes to those who need "a hand up rather than a hand out."

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Jesus has blessed us so we may be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Matthew Kennedy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping the less fortunate. What goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: Refreshing.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to be successful.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I am truly blessed everyday. I have a job, a home, and a beautiful loving family. If I can do anything to pass that along then I will have made some impact somwhere in someones life and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital. Everyday is challenging and exciting. Helping others is something that I like to do and welcome the opportunity to see others do the same.

lender.name: Bakker Family
lender.loan_because: Some people need a little more help than others, and if you have the means to help then you should.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 4 children, one of whom is special needs. I am lucky enough to be able to look after my children full time.

lender.name: Sanzaru
lender.loan_because: I understand the stresses of starting a business from nothing.
lender.occupational_info: Make games for people to play on their wii, playstation, or xbox.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: this seems like a great way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I determine the risks of businesses and find appropriate ways to handle the risk

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: it gives me joy.
lender.occupational_info: I teach psychology and women's studies classes at a small college.

lender.name: Trireka
lender.loan_because: I loan because Imp a single parent and know what its like to need financial help as I am trying to start my own business as well. God said give and it shall be given. Besides it just feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working as an information technologist. I basically take calls from people needing help with their computers.

lender.name: Arno
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Work with governments around the world resolving development issues.

lender.name: Scott & Chrie
lender.loan_because: The world is more beautiful when we reach out to one another. No small kindness is ever wasted.
lender.occupational_info: Scott locates earthquakes from volcanoes. Chrie is a wild mannered kindergarten teacher by day and children's book author in her "free time".

lender.name: Eve
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that I can; we all should.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Keas
lender.loan_because: I believe that God wants to put the world back to rights and micro-loaning is one way I can join him in this
lender.occupational_info: I am passionate about church planting and missions...i'm studying both right now so I can hopefully do a good job with them in the future

lender.name: Eric Herboso
lender.loan_because: ...it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my time considering various things, and attempting to come to conclusions about life's mysteries.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I feel it is an excellent way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Bravo Family
lender.loan_because: A tiny loan can change somebody's life and those around him/her. I hope that rich governments (U.S.A, EUROPE, Japan, etc) can learn from us (people sponsoring KIVA).

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: I have a home, food and healthcare. Millions do not.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I love having the opportunity to help people in need get a head start. You know what they say "Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, but teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime".

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: Because it is an honor. Because I am grateful. Because of the wonderful souls of those who made this opportunity possible for me.

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: Love makes the World go round. :-)

lender.name: Laura & Yancey
lender.occupation: small business owner and a registered nurse
lender.loan_because: we own and operate our small businesses and know this can change lives for others who are willing to work hard for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: auto towing business and we own a bar. i am also a nurse and assist elderly clients. i am interested in the health care industry.

lender.name: Jaimie
lender.loan_because: I feel good about helping people succeed and empowering them in their independence. I also don't have much that I can donate and this is the best way to maximize the impact of what litle I can give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of religious studies. I basically read all the time.

lender.name: Sasha
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all need help and support at some point - sometimes we're the helper, sometimes the helpee...

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: My heart fills to see someone's life impacted by their own gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find homes that help them live their dreams

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to give people a hand up to help them improve their lives, and it makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work as client and technical support in research administration at Stanford University.

lender.name: Mattias Petter Johansson
lender.loan_because: I'm not into charities, and admire entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Kati
lender.occupational_info: Changing the way Finnish people see, live, think and use alcohol.

lender.name: Mikko
lender.loan_because: There is a great need for these small loans. It is better to loan money for buying a fishing rod than donate money to buy fish.
lender.occupational_info: Academic teaching and researching about various aspects of human-computer interaction and making user interfaces better for non-technical users

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Empowering people to build their own lives is a privilege.

lender.name: Kristy
lender.whereabouts: The Entrance North New South Wales
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate and because I am compelled

lender.name: Ann Christin + Andreas
lender.loan_because: It is important.
lender.occupational_info: We design and prepare books for publishing houses.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are trying to help themselves and their country's economy. I am so happy to be able to make small loans that can change lives.

lender.name: Inna
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone should have an opportunity to better their life.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: that's the least I can do!

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because:
I'm opposed to charity, but I believe that those committed to improving their lives should be empowered to do so. For what I might waste on a meal I can afford to loan someone money so that they might improve their lives. I also look very favorably upon people creating businesses that employ others, because this activity not only supports the individuals' life, but helps support the community they live in as well. I believe supporting entrepreneurship on a micro level is a great thing to do.
This is quite honestly one of the greatest ideas and implementation of an idea I've ever seen.
(This is a brilliantly designed site)
lender.occupational_info: I analyze a variety of data and situations and make suggestions on future courses of action. I assess threats and suggest action to mitigate those threats.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: This seems like a wonderful opportunity to help people get started.
lender.occupational_info: I am a molecular biologist, currently studying bone and tooth development and regeneration.

lender.name: Vasili
lender.loan_because: Why not? It's a great way to help people out, and if you really need your money back you can withdraw it later. It's strange that people wouldn't do this. Great Idea!

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I love to empower others to empower themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate the removal of what's blocking you energetically, mentally, spiritually, physically or emotionally so you can create the life you desire.

lender.name: Harley
lender.loan_because:
It's best that Mr. J not keep all this loot we get.
Vroom!

lender.name: Paul and Marilyn
lender.loan_because: We hope to be helping someone have a better life for themselves and for their family.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's good, for them and for me.

lender.name: Steven & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We want to be role models for our children. We want to teach them that giving is more rewarding then anything physical thing they can receive. We want our children to 'see' that they are helping others in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Steven has recently started his own business. We strongly believe that empowering other entreprenuers to make their dreams a reality is as important as our own. We are super lucky and know that giving back is very rewarding.

lender.name: Kate, Jim, & Emma
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and want to help others have the resources to succeed.

lender.name: Art & Doreen
lender.loan_because: We enjoy being able to share with others. Microbusiness loans are a perfect way to help many people.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I love being able to give someone a hand up!

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I can. I feel like this is such a wonderful opportunity to help someone and see what is being done with the funds!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: We were inspired by President Bill Clinton to help, this is an amazing program to aide others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My Wife Darla and I are entrepreneurs in the safety business which is designed to safeguard against all hazards.

lender.name: SOCIAL EDUCATION SUPPORT
lender.loan_because: for durable sustainance and early child hood education
lender.occupational_info: Happy to be part of the team that bring smile to peoples life

lender.name: Vaclav
lender.loan_because: If you treat an individual as if he were what he ought to be and could be, he will become what he ought to be and could be. -- Goethe

lender.name: Priscila Dias
lender.loan_because:
I want to make a difference. Its a great feeling to know my contributions are helping others.
Keep up the good work! =)

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people who have the desire and drive to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a lumber yard/ hardware store.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I would not have opportunity and an education if loans were not available to me. To give is to receive!
lender.occupational_info: Social Science researcher, HIV and Drug Prevention, Program evaluator

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: Your site makes it easy to help in some small way others who are struggling to provide the necessities in life for their families.

lender.name: heidi
lender.loan_because: It is such an easy way to help someone less fortunate than myself. I feel I get more than I give: I will finally get my money back and still I get the delight of helping someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm married and I have 2 children. I'm a surgeon in an university hospital and visual artist.

lender.name: Wiliam
lender.loan_because: Micro loans are a great way to know your funds are working. The loans we make may be small but they make a measurable difference to the men and women who get them. A little push is all they need. Once they get their business off the ground, they can provide for themselves, their family, and even help others. But the best thing about this is knowing these folks have a real future.
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled but own and operate an electrical contracting firm. My company has about 20 excellent employees. My team pitched in when I was injured (saving me an even worse disaster). I owe them a lot. I understand how people helping people benefits everyone.

lender.name: Sherida
lender.loan_because: I am able to. My small donation is not much of a sacrifice for me, but hopefully will help to make a positive difference in someone else's life. We are all children of the same loving Heavenly parents who expect us to love and help one another when the opportunities are presented. I am grateful for being able to have this opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise a group of clerical/secretarial employees at a power plant.

lender.name: Giving for Good
lender.occupation: Nice Group of People who Want to Give

lender.name: Bryan & Kim
lender.loan_because: A problem we perceive with traditional banking is that it focuses on its own risk and return. The other benefits to access to credit (such as economic development and positive spillovers) are missed. We want to find someone who can really improve his or her well-being where our loan might actually make a difference. The opportunity cost we bear (by not getting interest and exposing myself to default risk) is minor in comparison.
lender.occupational_info: Bryan teaches and does research in Economics at Wake Forest University. Kim is a homemaker.

lender.name: michele
lender.loan_because: i feel as if i am part of the solution and not part of the problem. i have been helped so many times by total strangers that i wish to continue the goodness and well being that it generates.
lender.occupational_info: i worked 28 yrs for the us postal service, sorting mail on several different types of machinery.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: If we don't take care of those in need, who will take care of us when we are in need?
lender.occupational_info: I support the military-industrialist complex in the United States...so this is a way to compensate (kind of like buying carbon offsets so I can drive an SUV, huh?)

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I have a heart for the poor because God does
lender.occupational_info: I help companies use technology to improve their ability to service others

lender.name: Z. Chen
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: its something small I can do to help and yet, when combined with other people the effect can be great and affect a person's life in a positive way even if I don't know that person. I like the idea of assisting in the creation of hope.
lender.occupational_info: My son tells people his mom travels for a living. Actually, I do travel quite a bit. I open and manage operations for my company throughout central american and the caribbean while handling the business we have in south america from my office in Florida. I'm lucky - I love the job and the people I work with! I try to focus my loans on the areas of the world where I have have operations.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps! I'm glad my small contribution can make someone else's life a little better.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: it's a very cool way to spread wealth around the world where needed.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired.

lender.name: Jeff & Nicholas
lender.loan_because: We should always share what we have!

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I want to be connected to people trying to climb out of poverty. I know that microfinance works.

lender.name: Charmaine
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that this is a loan to help someone make a success of their business and not just a handout. I picked to give to women because I think women have to struggle harder to make it.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently retired, having retired from two different careers, however I do still work from January through April 15th, doing taxes for people, I am entering my 5th year of doing this. i am 69 years old, married (37 years), with one grown child, a great daugtht-in-law, and a 3 year old granddaughter.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I Care

lender.name: Marek
lender.loan_because: I think that with a little bit of help, people can do miracles.

lender.name: Terrence
lender.loan_because: I can. $25 is a good piece of money to my family too, and so when I can afford it, I like to know that someone else's family is feeling a bit more comfort, that the world cares and isn't out to get them.
lender.occupational_info: I make books by hand using age old tools and processes.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info:
I'm an online content publisher. Sometimes I write articles on my own and other times I hire writers to cover specific topics and stories for me. Essentially "new media" projects. I hope I bring health and hope to those seeking loans for their business and other projects. Good luck to you all!
Feel free to visit my website on renewable energy which you can find below. I believe in sustainable living and renewable energy and micro loans are all a part of it in my vision. Spread the word of sustainability and helping out your fellow man!

lender.name: felicity
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: The measure of your life will not be in what you accumulate, but in what you give away.
lender.occupational_info: To someone in another country who's not familiar with a Realtor; I help families buy, & sell homes.

lender.name: Manon
lender.loan_because: There isn't an easier way to change the world in to a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I try to find the best men/women for a job. I am helping companies and jobless people.

lender.name: Lyndsey
lender.loan_because: Our Father God wants us to love one another. This is my way and it feels good! I wish I could do more.
lender.occupational_info: My job is boring. I don't like working behind a desk. I'd rather make furniture, paint or write. But ya gotta do what pays the bills. I hope to one day be a carpenter or a baker!

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: A small group of thoughtful people could change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has. - Margaret Mead
lender.occupational_info: I endeavor to harness the talent of people in small communities and magnify their efforts locally and around the world.

lender.name: Kolin
lender.loan_because: if the situation were reversed I would appreciate the kindness.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Ohio University.

lender.name: Jose Antonio
lender.loan_because: There isn't a better way to generate progress from a distance hundreds of miles away...

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: it's a step, albeit a very small one, in alleviating the inequity that impacts us all. lending does more than aid entrepreneurs in fulfilling their dreams; it provides necessary resources and services to communities. when needs are met, security follows. i've been lucky to travel to some of the world's most beautiful and unique places, that are at the same time some of the most impoverished. this is my miniscule way of saying thank you

lender.name: jacki
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to that hope and dream for someone. To be able to help them change their world and, in reality, their family's financial tree forever.

lender.name: sage
lender.loan_because: This was a birthday gift from a friend when I turned 10. This web site really gives me a chance to help other people who need this kind of money . It also shows me that I am very fortunate to be able to have the kind of things I have (which is a lot!). Thankyou Mochi family!

lender.name: Patti & Steve
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate and want to make a difference.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I believe in good karma and I want to contribute to something greater than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help out teachers by assisting in lessons and setting up activities. I'm also in charge of one of our schools reading programs.

lender.name: Deepu and a bit of Artur
Joseph
lender.loan_because: Because I support the entreprenual spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Passing wisdom and the means to succeed to the next generations.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I know the world is bigger than my own backyard.
lender.occupational_info: I educate communities about healthy sexuality.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: love wins.
lender.occupational_info: an artist building community in Eastern Europe.

lender.name: Karil-SanFrancisco
lender.loan_because: I know that poverty is the root cause of the most horrible human problems. I want to help people, especially women, who are often the sole providers for their children, to escape poverty, to be able to care for their families, send their children to school, and as a result, build better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I produce, direct, shoot and edit documentaries, most often on topics of health, environment, democracy and issues of special importance to women.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: it provides opportunity to others.
lender.occupational_info: Spanish professor

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help local people and economies improve their way of living.
lender.occupational_info: I help to ensure that banks computer systems are secure and operating efficiently.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: A way that I can help others without having to come up with a large sum of money.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is our duty to society as a whole to help those less fortunate than ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage construction projects for a small company in Denver, Colorado.

lender.name: Satica Ranch
lender.loan_because: "Giving frees us from the familiar territory of our own needs by opening our minds to the unexplained worlds occupied by the needs of others." -Barbara Bush
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I operate a Cow-Calf Ranch

lender.name: Kimberly Anne
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help honest people in need. I was born in Medan, Indonesia and many of my family work as small store owners "tokos", pig farmers, sugar cane farmers and coffee farmers. Even though I live in the United States now, I still feel a connection to people with families, that work hard in agriculture and deserve a chance. I loan because I love to help and when I see the lenders succeed, it makes me feel happy.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university as an admission counselor. Everyday I speak with prospective students from across the country and help them find the area of study that best suits their needs and help motivate my students to stay in college and complete their degrees. I love helping them all and when my students graduate, it makes me so happy and proud.

lender.name: Marjory
lender.loan_because: Because I feel that I have been blessed in my life and want to share that blessing with others.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: It is fun to imagine that I just might have a tiny impact on someone else. and then I will get to do it again when the loan is repaid. I am building a ladder of loans to payoff in different months.
lender.occupational_info: financial planning and investments.

lender.name: Gemma
lender.loan_because: "How do you live in a better way? The essential thing is to help others. If more people are smiling, you get peace." - the Dalai Lama -

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: they need...

lender.name: shinstella
lender.loan_because: I am grateful.

lender.name: nadine
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual to make a positive impact.
lender.occupational_info: Love those little guys in second and third grade. Seven ,eight and nine year old children keep your feet on the ground, and running most of the time. I started a new behavior plan with my art classes. They can earn KIVA points for good behavior. When they get 25 points, I will let them choose where in the world they want their KIVA money to go. We are going to help artists all over the world with good behavior. They are really excited. So far third grade is ahead, but the second grade is not far behind!

lender.name: Ryan Mercer
lender.loan_because: What is a small amount to me, can make a drastic difference to others... why not help out?
lender.occupational_info: I clear international freight so that it can come into the country by filing the appropriate paperwork.

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: My children have made me a better person, they have so much - I want others to be able to provide for their children

lender.name: GeorgiAnne
lender.loan_because: Why not? Making a positive difference in other's lives - can it get better than that?
lender.occupational_info: I communicate to our internal partners when changes are occuring in any (of our many) computer systems.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I believe that our world is all interconnected, yet 98% of the world's wealth and resources are found within only 2% of the world's population. It is time that the 2% shared some of those resources. I loan because of my love for humanity and my belief in their resilience.
lender.occupational_info: I provide psychotherapy for children, adolescents and adults in the Dallas/Fort Worth area.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies (TV, film, and groups and organizations) to get their video seen on the internet.

lender.name: Debbi
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who have not been as fortunate as most of us in the United States.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I know what it feels like to be a single woman building several businesses of my own. It is a large and exciting task!
lender.occupational_info: I am in the international freight business, a life coach, and I have a sales training business.

lender.name: JoAnne
lender.loan_because: It makes a huge difference in people's lives by giving them a chance to become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of property that people can rent so that they may have a place to live or work.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I would like to give back to the people of Viet Nam. The cost of their suffering, by the hands of U.S. military, 40 years ago, can never be repaid. This is only the little part I can play in the repaying our debt.

lender.name: Logan
lender.loan_because: I know that there are so many people in the world that do not have the opportunities that we have. I have picked this is a way to give back from my own lawn cutting money.
lender.occupational_info: I am only thirteen years old but I do help maintain about 40 acres of lawn all summer. I also make money raking, shoveling snow, however I can. When I am older I hope to be a pilot or a fireman

lender.name: Shefali
lender.loan_because: Because its nice to do
lender.occupational_info: I help sick people get better

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: This is the perfect program - supporting entrepreneurs but also being able to reinvest the money !
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at the Plains Conservation Center and the Denver Dumb Friends league.

lender.name: Bill & Marguerite
lender.loan_because: We like to offer opportunities to others because we have been so blessed in what we have been able to do.
lender.occupational_info: Was a nurse in a doctor's office, and account executive for a trade-show exhibit company. Now both retired.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to raise the global vibration.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: These loans really do change lives, often of whole families, and it's so easy to do.
lender.occupational_info: Nearly 40 years in IT and banking. Kiva helps keep things in perspective during these difficult economic times.

lender.name: Constantin
lender.loan_because: There is so much we can help others for so little. A great way to make people become independent rather than simply donating.
lender.occupational_info: I am a programming consultant with clients in LA, NY and Florida. Love to help others in need who want to make to get back on their feet...

lender.name: Lefthand
lender.occupational_info: "Then it was as if I suddenly saw the secret beauty of their hearts, the depth of their hearts where neither sin nor knowledge could reach, the core of reality, the person that each one is in the eyes of the divine. If only they could see themselves as they really are, if only we could see each other that way all the time, there would be no more need for war, for hatred, for greed, for cruelty. I suppose the big problem would be that we would fall down & worship each other." (Tara Brach, Radical Acceptance p272)

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm also an entrepreneur and understand how difficult it is to raise enough funds to start and maintain a business. It's a pleasure to be able to help others who want to be self-employed and provide a service.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student in art school working toward a second bachelor's degree in animation (cartoon films).

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: To try to help out, as others have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I repair passenger aircraft making the planes safe to fly in.

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to do so

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the best ways to help change the world
lender.occupational_info: Through trends and research I help make sure that apartment complexes rent thier units at the best price in order to create a win/win situation for everyone.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: I help people stay healthy.

lender.name: dch
lender.loan_because: it is a small way to help others and remind oneself of how fortunate we truly are....
lender.occupational_info: investing in and assisting new business ventures to grow into successful organizations

lender.name: Graham & Flynn
lender.loan_because: They need this money more than us.

lender.name: emilio astier pea
lender.loan_because: l feel good helping others....to live in this time and this planet and doing it a better place

lender.name: Evan & Family
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical company

lender.name: jared
lender.loan_because: I would like to see people have as much money as they can to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: great working with technology that i love so much

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of a concrete solution to the cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of the financial transactions (money spent and received) for the business I work for. I'm also studying to become an Accountant.

lender.name: Kathi
lender.occupation: wife, mother of 4 and a pediatric RN
lender.loan_because: As a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, I believe that it is my duty to help others. We all need a helping hand up at some point in our lives and giving back is a way to honor those who helped me when I needed it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pediatric RN (nurse) and work with young children who have special health care needs.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: This is a very interesting concept that I would like to support. I especially enjoy the thought of supporting women in business as I was a business woman myself a few years ago. I owned a spa & boutique that used organic products & sold local art work & recycled clothing. I know it takes money to make money.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently working with the elderly as an occupational therapist in skilled nursing. I'm also working in the community providing therapy to seniors who live in assisted living facilities.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact in other parts of the world, and micro finance is a great way to do just that. I also loan because I have been blessed with the opportunity and the means to help others who have not.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Wake Forest University, interested in International Development and will probably major in Political Science or History, and hopefully attend graduate school for International Studies.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe if you give what you need it will come back to you.
lender.occupational_info: I work very hard a being the best parent I can be.

lender.name: Celina
lender.loan_because: I like to help others in need and possibly make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to children from Kindergarten to 5th Grade whose primary language is other than English.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I received a lot of private financial help that enabled me to graduate from college and I want to continue to pass on what was so generously given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of women during the birthing process.

lender.name: Aleece
lender.loan_because: people were very nice to me a long time ago, and I have never forgotten how much the small things mean.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a court reporter and realtime writer for closed captioning.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I believe in the micro-loan concept, and feel that everyone can make a difference in this world - no matter how small their donation is.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government retirement system, and I make sure that retirees get their pensions properly and on time.

lender.name: Kayleigh
lender.loan_because: People are people, no matter where they're from, what they believe in, or their socio-economic backgrounds.

lender.name: Mika
lender.loan_because: I want her to have a sustainable life in happy with lots of smile!

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: because I can

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy or sell their personal home.

lender.name: Meribeth
lender.loan_because: It's Fun
lender.occupational_info: Stay in School

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I loan money to hard-working, good people in third world countries to give others less fortunate than me a chance to live a better life with a slight helping hand. Then if they don't pay me back I fly out there to break their legs. It's been 12 months, where's my $25???
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I drink beer. Lots and lots of beer. I dunno, I'm a pretty bad loan shark. I never seem to make any money off this gig. I think I have to be less lazy and start charging interest. I've tried asking my late paying customers to travel to New York so I can break their legs, but they never listen to me. I'm thinking about taking out a Kiva loan to buy some lead pipes and hire some overseas goons to get my business off the ground.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: dispersed economic prosperity will unify the world
lender.occupational_info: social responsibility

lender.name: Fatim
lender.loan_because: My family and I have been blessed with health and comfort. We need to share that with others and help them achieve their goals in life.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and journalist

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: My daughter stephanie (4 years old) and I choose who we can help. It is a great teaching tool for both of us.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an Indian Tribe in the desert of the United States. My job is to keep everyone safe while they are trying to work

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: It feels so much more meaningful and personal to lend money to an INDIVIDUAL rather than give money to a big charity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired from the business world where I worked at an 'office job' in the area of Business Intelligence. (I'm an American living in Sweden.)

lender.name: Namaste Faustino
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to enjoy life more RIGHT NOW.

lender.name: Ganapathy Family
lender.loan_because: This is the least we can do. Empowering people to work their way to a better life is more powerful than charity.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are happy parents of two wonderful children. I took the easy job... working with computers. My wife on the other hand makes us a family and provides us with a home.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: i feel that this is one of the only ways you can help a specific person and know that all of your money is going to that person, rather to in the pockets of governments.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a record label and promote our artists to the radio industry in the UK.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I really believe in empowering motivated entrepreneurs to be able to follow their dreams and achieve financial independence in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I create and manage programs that teach children and young adults how to set goals, manage their money and become financially independent.

lender.name: Tran
lender.loan_because: It s the best opportunity for everyone anywhere. Their can outdo extreme poor. And it s right oneself began to do rich in future,
lender.occupational_info: All time I was worked by it still not enough to do my bussiness, but that defeated so not . I really admiring of this teams with help by money already everyone development on global. Thank you very much.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I am interested in seeing other people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people the best way to exercise their body and encourage them to exercise weekly.

lender.name: Yukino
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a very valuable opportunity.Supporting someone is my pleasure. I realy appreciate my friend Leslie who told me about Kiva.
